#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;


int main()
{
   long long int t;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   {
       string str;
       cin>>str;
       int p[26]={0};
       int q[26]={0};
       int ctr=0;
       for(int i=0;str[i]!='\0';++i)
       {
           if(str[i]>='a' && str[i]<='z')
            ++p[str[i]-'a'];
            else if(str[i]>='A' && str[i]<='Z')
            ++q[str[i]-'A'];
       }
       for(int i=0;i<26;++i)
       {
           if(p[i]%2!=0)
           {
               ctr+=p[i]/2;
               ++ctr;
           }
           else if(p[i]%2==0)
           {
               ctr+=p[i]/2;
           }
           if(q[i]%2!=0)
           {
               ctr+=q[i]/2;
               ++ctr;
           }
           else
           {
               ctr+=q[i]/2;
           }
       }
       cout<<ctr<<"\n";
   }
    return 0;
}
